entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
